title: New: Rains – Fed Up
content:
Having already played shows with The Districts, Only Real and Wet, Manchester trio Rains have more experience than their limited social media presence would suggest, yet Fed Up appears to be their debut offering.

So it’s not a polished, indie pop song, you’re unlikely to hear it in Topman, but there’s something ‘cool’ about it. It’s laidback and effortless in the same way that Mac DeMarco has made a career from being so, all whilst telling a story of self-improvement within love. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
